articles.title: Europe migrant crisis: Italy moves to rescue 1200 people on boats - BBC
articles.description: Two overcrowded fishing boats carrying 800 and 400 people are found off the coast of Sicily.
articles.content:
The Italian coastguard is carrying out two large-scale operations to rescue around 1,200 migrants from overcrowded boats off the coast of Sicily.

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for April 11, 2023 - Bloomberg
articles.description: US equity futures took their cue from a positive day in Europe and Asia, even as investors braced for inflation data and corporate results that could confirm fears about the health of the financial system.
